imdb.title: Jibaku Shounen Hanako-kun
imdb.plot: Hanako is an urban legend said to be the spirit of a young girl that haunts school toilets, but as Nene finds out, her academy's Hanako is actually a boy, and he is only one of many spirits inhabiting the place.

episodes.title: Hanako-san of the Bathroom
episodes.plot: Yashiro Nene is looking for ghostly help with her love life, but when "Hanako-san," the wish-granting spirit that haunts a girls' bathroom stall, turns out to be a boy, she may end up getting more, and less, than she bargained for.

episodes.title: Yousei-san
episodes.plot: A rash of mysterious thefts hits the school, and rumor has it that the apparition "Yousei-san" is behind it. When Nene catches sight of the creature, will she end up losing more than just her school supplies?

episodes.title: The Misaki Stairs Part 1
episodes.plot: Nene's best friend vanishes without a trace and no one else remembers she ever existed! To get her friend back, Nene is forced to call on Hanako for help and journey into a "Boundary" between the world of the living and the world of the dead.

episodes.title: The Misaki Stairs, Part 2
episodes.plot: Nene, Hanako, and Kou have reached the top of the Misaki Stairs, where a mysterious and bewitching woman awaits them. Will Nene get her friend back, or will she vanish along with her?

episodes.title: The Confession Tree
episodes.plot: The school is full on unlikely couples thanks to a tree that rumor has it makes any confession made under it succeed. When Hanako asks Nene to meet him there, Nene starts to suspect that he sees her as more than an assistant.

episodes.title: The 4 O'clock Library
episodes.plot: In search of Hanako's secrets, Nene and Kou enter the fifth Wonder, the 4 O'clock Library. It's books contain the past and future of every student their school has ever had, but some knowledge comes at a price.

episodes.title: Donuts
episodes.plot: Nene's relationship with Hanako becomes strained after she learns about his past. With some baking help from Kou, she tries to talk things out with Hanako over donuts, but their heart-to-heart is interrupted by a shocking intruder.

episodes.title: Mitsuba
episodes.plot: Kou gets more than he bargained for when he tries to help a student's ghost rest in peace. The late Mitsuba may look delicate, but his language is anything but. Can Kou put up with him long enough to help him?

episodes.title: Tea Party
episodes.plot: After a surprise invitation, Nene finds herself kidnapped and taken to - a fancy tea party? Nene quickly drops her guard in coversation with the beautiful and mysterious Sakura, but is their meeting as innocent as it seems?

episodes.title: The Hell of Mirrors, Part 1
episodes.plot: While looking over the gardening club's records, Nene finds out that there are supernatural beings that lurk only in photos of her! To get rid of them, Hanako-kun, Nene, and Kou decide to follow their demands until they're satisfied. One by one, they start to disappear, but it appears the last one's desire is to bring Nene into its boundary...

episodes.title: The Hell of Mirrors, Part 2
episodes.plot: Tsukasa rescues Nene and Mitsuba from the Hell of Mirrors, but does the mercurial ghost have something worse in store for them? Meanwhile, Hanako and Kou race to find a way to follow Nene, but will they make it in time?

episodes.title: Little Mermaid
episodes.plot: Nene made it back from the Hell of Mirrors in one piece, but she worries about what Hanako may be hiding from her. Just then, strange fish appear, calling her their princess and asking her to join them as the mermaid's successor.
